sentences.en: And then elicit different interpolate algorithms in the different conditions.
sentences.cn: 并且然后得出不同内插算法在不同的条件.

sentences.en: Androids can thus elicit the most natural communication.
sentences.cn: 但除了这类正当理由,石黑浩相信,人类对极像人的机器反应较好.

sentences.en: Ask probing questions to elicit more details.
sentences.cn: 用探索性的问题了解更多的细节.

sentences.en: Being confident and smiley will elicit a far more positive response.
sentences.cn: 充满信心的笑容往往会得到比较正面的回应.

sentences.en: Do happy folks elicit greater attention from their teachers?
sentences.cn: 是不是幸福的人更多吸引了老师的注意?

sentences.en: Don't try to elicit business secrets from me. I won't tell you anything.
sentences.cn: 你休想从我这里套问出我们的商业机密, 我什么都不会告诉你的.

sentences.en: Enlist people's participation to elicit information relevant to your project.
sentences.cn: 发动人们的参与,来引出于与你的项目相关的信息.

sentences.en: Food sources also elicit oriented locomotion and recognition behavior patterns in most insects.
sentences.cn: 食物源也引诱大多数昆虫定向迁移和识别行为.

sentences.en: He thought by this little trick to elicit Butler's real name.
sentences.cn: 他想利用这个小小的花巧办法诱出巴特勒的真姓名来.

sentences.en: I could elicit no response from him.
sentences.cn: 我从他那里套不出任何反应。

sentences.en: Mr. Norris said he was hopeful that his request would elicit a positive response.
sentences.cn: 诺里斯先生说他希望他的要求会引起积极的回应。

sentences.en: My letters to her have elicited no response.
sentences.cn: 我写给她的信没有得到回应。

sentences.en: That is, relaxation may elicIt'sensations, thoughts, and feelings that were previously inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 那就是, 放松可以引出之前难以触及的感觉, 想法和情绪.

sentences.en: The bright, swirling dresses add to the spectacle, and elicit 4 cries of encouragement from the spectators.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳 、 扬的裙摆使表演场面更加壮观, 引得观众频频叫好.

sentences.en: The research applied quantitative and qualitative Methods: To elicit rich data.
sentences.cn: 本研究综合运用了定量和定性的研究方法,收集了许多相关的实验数据.

sentences.en: This picture book is elicit gales of laughter and better punctuation from all who read it.
sentences.cn: 或许正是秉持这样一种写作的目的,这本书才更加适合大众理解和阅读.

sentences.en: When her knock elicited no response, she opened the door and peeped in.
sentences.cn: 敲门没有回应，她便推开门往里张望。

sentences.en: When I was able to elicit only a gentle smile, I thought perhaps this was a commentary on my humor.
sentences.cn: 当我只能让人微微一笑时，我觉得这可能是对我幽默感的一种评价吧。

trans.tran_en: to succeed in getting information or a reaction from someone, especially when this is difficult
If you elicit a piece of information, you get it by asking the right questions
